trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação da interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> é uma implementação completa de um carregador de designer sem nada relacionado a um formato de persistência.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features:
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> não indicar um texto ou binária persistência, mas ele suporta os seguintes recursos:

trans-unit.source: Multiple load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Várias dependências de carga.

trans-unit.source: Tracking changes within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Controle de alterações no designer.

trans-unit.source: Deferred idle-time reloading.
trans-unit.target: Adiada recarregando o tempo ocioso.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> adds two kinds of services to the designer host’s service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> adiciona dois tipos de serviços ao contêiner de serviço do host designer: serviços substituíveis e serviços insubstituíveis.

trans-unit.source: You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir um serviço substituível alterando o valor de protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode substituir serviços insubstituíveis porque suas implementações dependem uns aos outros.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the services that are provided by default.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve os serviços que são fornecidos por padrão.

trans-unit.source: Default Service
trans-unit.target: Serviço padrão

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle.
trans-unit.target: Permite que os objetos solicitar que o designer de recarregar quando ele estiver ocioso.

trans-unit.source: This is a replaceable service.
trans-unit.target: Este é um serviço substituível.

trans-unit.source: Used to serialize and deserialize objects.
trans-unit.target: Usado para serializar e desserializar objetos.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de serialização é adicionado como um serviço para que objetos que precisam para realizar a serialização podem utilizar qualquer provedor de serialização que foram adicionados ao Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: This is an irreplaceable service.
trans-unit.target: Este é um serviço insubstituíveis.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obter acesso completo aos recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Exigem valores: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estados associados:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer loader host to load.
trans-unit.target: O host do carregador de designer a ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: Starts the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: This is an implementation of the abstract <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma implementação do resumo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override this method in your own class.
trans-unit.target: Você não precisa substituir este método em sua própria classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método executa as seguintes ações:

trans-unit.source: It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded.
trans-unit.target: Ele verifica a superfície de design ainda não tenha carregado.

trans-unit.source: On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Na primeira chamada, ele adiciona serviços relevantes e chama o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Ele chama o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> methods instead of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se o serviço de carregador de designer não tiver sido removido do contêiner de serviços, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> chamará o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> métodos em vez do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nessa situação, é responsabilidade do serviço de carregador de designer para chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="host" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="host" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer is already loaded, or <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> has been called with a different designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: O designer já foi carregado ou <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> foi chamado com um host do carregador de designer diferente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="host" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="host" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> method does not flush changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> método não liberar alterações para o carregador do designer.

trans-unit.source: If you want changes to be saved, call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que as alterações a serem salvas, chame <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> antes de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> quando tiver terminado de usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> método deixa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> em um estado inutilizável.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>, você deve liberar todas as referências para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> para o coletor de lixo possa recuperar a memória que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> estava ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar sua última referência para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está usando não serão liberados até que o coletor de lixo chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> do objeto `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable component notification by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />; <see langword="false" /> to disable component notification by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para habilitar a notificação de componente pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />; <see langword="false" /> para desabilitar a notificação de componente pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables component notification with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Habilita ou desabilita a notificação de componente com o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the component notification was enabled prior to this call; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a notificação de componente tiver sido habilitada antes desta chamada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flushes pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Libera alterações pendentes para o carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader has not been loaded or has not been marked as modified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Se o carregador de designer não foi carregado ou não foi marcado como modificada, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método retorna imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> asks the serialization manager to create a serialization session and then calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> solicita que o Gerenciador de serialização para criar uma sessão de serialização e, em seguida, chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The requested service, or <see langword="null" /> if the requested service cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: O serviço solicitado ou <see langword="null" /> se o serviço solicitado não puder ser encontrado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.GetService%2A> is a helper method that allows classes deriving from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> to access services offered by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.GetService%2A> é um método auxiliar que permite que classes derivadas de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> para acessar os serviços oferecidos pelo host do carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes services.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa os serviços.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method is called the first time <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> método é chamado na primeira vez <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> é invocado.

trans-unit.source: You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar todos os serviços necessários para hospedar o carregador de designer neste momento.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation adds services that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base adiciona serviços que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> oferece, portanto, depois de chamar a implementação base, você pode substituir os serviços existentes.

trans-unit.source: You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve remover quaisquer serviços personalizados que você adicionar aqui, substituindo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o designer deve ser recarregado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o designer deve ser recarregado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão sempre retorna <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.IsReloadNeeded%2A> method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.IsReloadNeeded%2A> método é usado por alguns carregadores de designer para otimizar o recarregamento.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading.
trans-unit.target: Este método pode ser substituído se o carregador de designer oferece suporte ao recarregar inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary.
trans-unit.target: Alguns carregadores de designer podem detectar alterações feitas em seu documento subjacente e determinar se um recarregamento do designer é realmente necessário.

trans-unit.source: If not, they should return `false` from this method.
trans-unit.target: Se não, eles devem retornar `false` deste método.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> will succeed.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão sempre retorna `true`, que indica que qualquer chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> terá êxito.

trans-unit.source: Gets the loader host.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o host do carregador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> that was passed to the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> que foi passado para o <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the loader host that was given to this designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna o host do carregador que foi fornecido para o carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> has not been called yet, or if this designer loader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode ser `null` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> ainda não foi chamado ou se o carregador de designer foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer loader is loading the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o carregador do designer está carregando a superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer loader is currently loading the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o carregador de designer atualmente está carregando a superfície de design; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, which supports load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> classe fornece a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, que oferece suporte ao carregar as dependências.

trans-unit.source: This property takes load dependencies into account and will return `true` if there are any outstanding load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade tem dependências de carga em conta e irá retornar `true` se houver qualquer dependência de carga pendentes.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o designer foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer has been modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />,
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer foi modificado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />,

trans-unit.source: Determines if the designer loader has detected that the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o carregador de designer detectou que o designer foi modificado.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` when the designer loader’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called, the designer loader will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for `true` quando o carregador de designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método é chamado, o carregador de designer chamará o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer de que o carregamento está prestes a começar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method is invoked to start the loading process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> método é chamado para iniciar o processo de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time.
trans-unit.target: Você deve executar qualquer inicialização necessária para carregamento no momento.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to perform the actual load.
trans-unit.target: Este método não deve ser usado para executar a carga real.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> for loading.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão desativa as notificações de alteração e configura o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> para carregamento.

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> when the first dependent load occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> para fornecer suporte a carga dependente, você deve chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> quando ocorre o primeiro carregamento dependente.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método após a última chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> e faz isso para você.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> não está disponível quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> é chamado, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> diretamente chamará <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer seu próprio serviço de carregador, ou se você optar por não fornecer um serviço de carregador, você é responsável por chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> isso indiretamente chamando automaticamente será chamada de método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> estiver disponível, ou diretamente se não for.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer de que o descarregamento está prestes a começar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A> método é invocado quando o carregador de designer está prestes a descarregar o documento.

trans-unit.source: The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load.
trans-unit.target: O documento pode ser descarregado em preparação para recarregar, ou se a falha ao carregar o documento.

trans-unit.source: If you added document-specific services in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remove them here.
trans-unit.target: Se você adicionou serviços específicos do documento em <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remova-os aqui.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the load completed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o carregamento tiver sido concluído com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contém objetos (geralmente exceções) relatados como erros.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer de que o carregamento foi concluído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method is invoked when loading is finished.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método é invocado quando o carregamento for concluído.

trans-unit.source: It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado, mesmo se uma exceção for lançada durante o carregamento.

trans-unit.source: The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `successful` será definida como `true` se a carga for bem-sucedida, ou `false` se ocorreu um erro fatal.

trans-unit.source: The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: O `errors` coleção contém objetos que foram relatados como erros.

trans-unit.source: Usually, these objects are exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esses objetos são exceções.

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você implementar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> para fornecer suporte a carga dependente, você deve chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método após a última chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> e faz isso para você.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> after calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> não está disponível quando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> é chamado, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> chamará diretamente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> depois de chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve ser chamado pelo serviço de carregador de designer quando todas as cargas dependentes tiverem sido concluídas.

trans-unit.source: This stops the loading process that was initiated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso interrompe o processo de carregamento foi iniciado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Se você fornecer seu próprio serviço de carregador, ou se você optar por não fornecer um serviço de carregador, você é responsável por chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método automaticamente chamará isso indiretamente chamando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> estiver disponível, ou diretamente se não for.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o carregador do designer de que o estado do documento está prestes a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> método é chamado em resposta a uma alteração de componente, adicionando, ou remover o evento que indica que o designer está prestes a ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: You can implement source code control by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode implementar o controle do código fonte, substituir esse método.

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> does not mean that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.
trans-unit.target: Uma chamada para <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> não significa que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> propriedade posteriormente será definida como `true`; ela simplesmente indica uma intenção de fazer isso.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for persisting the state of loaded designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> a ser usado para manter o estado dos designers carregados.

trans-unit.source: Flushes all changes to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Libera todas as alterações para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader needs to flush to persistence any changes made to the designers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método é invocado quando o carregador de designer precisa liberar para persistência todas as alterações feitas aos designers.

trans-unit.source: It is invoked in response to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado em resposta a uma chamada para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for loading state for the designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> a ser usado para carregar o estado dos designers.

trans-unit.source: Loads a designer from persistence.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um designer da persistência.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader needs to load its state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> método é invocado quando o carregador de designer precisa carregar seu estado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> is called before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> é chamado antes de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method to load the designer contents.
trans-unit.target: Você deve implementar esse método para carregar o conteúdo do designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property provider for the serialization manager being used by the loader.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de propriedade para o gerenciador de serialização que está sendo usado pelo carregador.

trans-unit.source: An object whose properties are to be provided to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto cujas propriedades devem ser fornecidos para o Gerenciador de serialização.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager provides a `Properties` property on its primary interface that can be read by serializers to customize their serialization to specific needs.
trans-unit.target: O Gerenciador de serialização fornece um `Properties` propriedade em sua interface principal que pode ser lido por serializadores Personalize sua serialização para necessidades específicas.

trans-unit.source: The properties that are examined by the serializers vary depending on the type of serializer used.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades que são examinadas pelos serializadores variam dependendo do tipo de serializador usado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: Queues a reload of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Enfileira um recarregamento do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> method can be invoked by the designer loader to request a reload of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> método pode ser chamado pelo carregador de designer para solicitar um recarregamento do designer.

trans-unit.source: Because reloads are performed at idle time, this method does not actually reload the designer; it just queues the reload.
trans-unit.target: Porque recargas são executadas no tempo ocioso, esse método, na verdade, não recarregar o designer; Ele apenas filas de recarregar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a reload has been queued.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um recarregamento foi enfileirado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if a call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions)" /> has queued a reload request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, se uma chamada para <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions)" /> colocou em fila para uma solicitação de recarregamento; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing error objects, usually exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contém objetos de erro, geralmente exceções.

trans-unit.source: Reports errors that occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Relata erros que ocorreram ao liberar alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> method is called during <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> if one or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> método é chamado durante <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> se um ou mais erros ao liberar alterações.

trans-unit.source: The values in the `errors` collection can be exceptions or objects with <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> values that describe the error.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de `errors` coleção pode ser exceções ou objetos com <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> valores que descrevem o erro.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> raises the last exception in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A implementação padrão de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> gera a última exceção na coleção.

trans-unit.source: One or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais erros ocorreram ao liberar alterações.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full name of the component to be designed.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome completo do componente a ser criado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the full class name of the base component.
trans-unit.target: Define o nome de classe completo do componente base.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A> method should be called during loading to establish the full name of the component a designer is designing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A> método deve ser chamado durante o carregamento para estabelecer o nome completo do componente de criação de um designer.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers an external component as part of the load process managed by <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.
trans-unit.target: Registra um componente externo como parte do processo de carregamento gerenciado pelo <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method once for each external object participating in the load process.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> método uma vez para cada objeto externo que participam do processo de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called when the work of the load process is done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> método é chamado quando o trabalho do processo de carregamento é feito.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to load successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> a ser carregado com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing errors that occurred during the load.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contém erros que ocorreram durante o carregamento.

trans-unit.source: Signals that a dependent load has finished.
trans-unit.target: Assinala que um carregamento dependente foi concluído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método é chamado para indicar que uma operação de carregamento dependente foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method once for every process that was registered by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method, which has already completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> método uma vez para cada processo que foi registrado por chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> método, que já foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se a carga dependente for bem-sucedida, os conjuntos de chamador de `successful` parâmetro `true` e passa em uma coleção vazia ou `null` para o `errorCollection` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se a carga dependente encontrar erros, o chamador define o `successful` parâmetro `false` e passa uma coleção de exceções que indicam o motivo ou os motivos da falha para o `errorCollection` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: No load dependencies have been added by <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerLoaderService#AddLoadDependency" />, or the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma dependência de carregamento foi adicionada pelo <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerLoaderService#AddLoadDependency" /> ou o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> não foi inicializado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the design document.
trans-unit.target: Recarrega o documento de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reload request is accepted; <see langword="false" /> if the loader does not allow the reload.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a solicitação de recarregamento for aceita; <see langword="false" /> se o carregador não permitir o recarregamento.

trans-unit.source: Any object can call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23Reload%2A> method to request that the loader reload the design document.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer objeto pode chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23Reload%2A> método para solicitar que o carregador de recarregar o documento de design.

trans-unit.source: If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se o carregador dá suporte ao recarregar e está em conformidade com o recarregamento, o carregador de designer pode retornar `true`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, retornará `false`, indicando que a recarga não ocorrerá.

trans-unit.source: Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once.
trans-unit.target: Chamadores não podem contar com a recarga acontecendo imediatamente. o carregador de designer pode agendá-la para outro momento, ou ele pode tentar recarregar o designer de uma vez.

trans-unit.source: The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: O chamador pode exibir uma mensagem para o usuário se o designer não pode ser recarregado.
